text: Good morning sunshine. yeee aaj last day hai. Cant wait to call you and tell you all my experience till now. But first i wanna kiss you and tell you how fortunate i am that you are there for me and always showing me the light and correct path to follow. Please be mine babu. I want to be with you my whole life. 🌞

Lunch?. Ajj to bahut kam hoga na, but tum jada kaam maat karna, apna kam kar ke masti karna. Its very important to do masti as that's what we crave for right, kuch dost thore pagal jese and unke saat masti karte raho, fir mai bhi aajunga tumhare saat masti karne, miss you babu. 🍱
